mean_cn: vi. 因文化传入而变化；  vt. 借文化传入使……变化
mean_en: to learn to live successfully in a different culture; to help sb to do this
sentence: The immigrant child must quickly acculturate and learn the way of the local people.
sentence_trans: 这位移民的孩子 必须快速适应并学习当地人的行事方式。
word_etyma: ac加强+cult培养+ur+ate造成→acculturate适应文化而变化
